name: Álvaro Barreiro
content: Alvaro Barreiro's Home Page HTML Document Alvaro Barreiro Contact Info Research Courses Publications Links Contact Catedrático de Universidad (Professor) Information Retrieval Lab Departamento de Computación Facultad de Informática University of A Coruña Postal Address: Office. 4.16, Fac. Informática Campus de Elviña s/n, 15071, A Coruña, SPAIN Phone contact: Voice: +34 981 167 000 ext. 1270 Fax: +34 981 167 160 Email: barreiro@udc.es Research Research topics, projects and publications: Information Retrieval: IR Lab Recent publications I am member of ACM SIGIR, BCS IRSG and AEPIA (Spanish Association for AI) Courses Taught Since I joined the University of A Coruña I have taught Programming, Operating Systems, Artificial Vision, Artificial Intelligence, Cognitive Science and Information Retrieval in the Fac. of Informatics. Currently I teach Cognitive Science (Opt. II-ITIG-ITIS, 2C) Operating Systems (Graduate degree in Informatics Engineering, 1C) Information Retrieval (Graduate degree in Informatics Engineering, 2C) Information Retrieval and Semantic Web (Master in Informatics Engineering, 1C) Degree Projects (Proyectos Fin de Carrera) Publications You can download some preprints from the list of publications of irlab.org, or send me a message to barreiro@udc.es Other lists: DBLP list for Alvaro Barreiro Google Scholar list for Alvaro Barreiro ResearcherID list for Alvaro Barreiro ORCID list for Alvaro Barreiro Links of interest Coming soon...
